thread.title: Rob Lutter

author: Rob Lutter
title: Rob Lutter
text: Knew of housesitting and, after cycling round the world, needed a way to bridge the gap between normal life back home and life on the road. Trustedhousitters website was a literal lifesaver - an incredibly safe, easy to use, hugely functional site which has allowed me to travel around my country looking after pets in dozens of amazing places. The safe is so well built, has fast and personal customer support and a lot depth in terms of portfolio, rating systems, messages systems and calendars, references and reviews. Incredible! Definitely worth the yearly membership.
